key.name: window-width
key.summary: Width of the window in pixels
key.description: Width of the window in pixels.

key.name: window-height
key.summary: Height of the window in pixels
key.description: Height of the window in pixels.

key.name: window-is-maximized
key.summary: true if the window is maximized
key.description: true if the window is maximized.

key.name: first-run
key.description: Setting to decide whether to show first-run hint dialog or not.

key.name: tile-size
key.description: Size of game tiles.

key.name: start-level
key.description: Game level to start on.

key.name: speed
key.description: Worms movement speed.

key.name: sound
key.description: Enable sounds.

key.name: fakes
key.description: Enable fake bonuses.

key.name: players
key.description: Number of human players.

key.name: ai
key.description: Number of AI players.

key.name: color
key.description: Color to use for worm.

key.name: move-relative
key.description: Use relative movement (ie. left or right only).

key.description: Key to use for motion up.
